effect.sword_shield: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.legends_arceus: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.sword_shield: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
